name: Medieval Tales Solitaire
description:
When a powerful ancient monster enters the kingdom through a mysterious portal, it's up to you and your friends to push the beast back and restore peace! With time running out and a colorful cast of characters by your side, you're ready for a solitaire adventure like no other!


Features:

- An epic adventure of mages, knights, monsters, and more!!
- Tons of clever mini-games to test your skills!
- Dozens of unique quests to complete and achievements to unlock!
